title: Execute Smoke Test Verification
description: As a release manager, I want to run smoke tests so that I can verify critical functionality works after deployment.
soThat: I can verify critical functionality works after deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Given deployment is complete, when smoke tests execute, then all critical paths pass within 5 minutes
Given test failures occur, when detected, then rollback procedures are triggered automatically
Given smoke tests pass, when verified, then production release is approved for traffic
